trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface de notificação de edição.

trans-unit.source: To create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> column with special properties, you must first inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> coluna com propriedades especiais, você deve primeiro herdam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService> interface is provided to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> when a column is being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService> interface é fornecida para notificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> quando uma coluna está sendo editada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that is editing the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que está editando a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Informs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> that the user has begun editing the column.
trans-unit.target: Informa ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> que o usuário começou a editar a coluna.

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to show a pencil in the row header indicating the row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> método permite que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle para mostrar um lápis no cabeçalho da linha que indica a linha está sendo editado.
